results.title: Statins and Their Effect on Hearing: An All of Us Database Study.
results.text_hl: In the individual statin analysis, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was associated with the strongest correlation with @DISEASE_Hearing_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D034381 @@@hearing loss@@@ (OR = 1.56, P < .01) and @<m>DISEASE_Tinnitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014012 @@@tinnitus@@@ (OR = 1.50, P < .01) while @CHEMICAL_Fluvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077340 @@@fluvastatin@@@ was the least associated both @DISEASE_Hearing_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D034381 @@@hearing loss@@@ (OR = 1.15, P < .01) and @<m>DISEASE_Tinnitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014012 @@@tinnitus@@@ (OR = 1.02, P = .68).

citations.NLM: Homer BJ, Kasthuri VS, Jain R, Homer AS, Gjini E, Noonan KY. Statins and Their Effect on Hearing: An All of Us Database Study. Ann Otol Rhinol Laryngol. 2025 Jul 29;():34894251359135. PMID: 40728037
citations.BibTeX: @article{40728037, title={Statins and Their Effect on Hearing: An All of Us Database Study.}, author={Homer BJ and Kasthuri VS and Jain R and Homer AS and Gjini E and Noonan KY}, journal={Ann Otol Rhinol Laryngol}, pages={34894251359135}}

results.title: Simvastatin and Ginkgo biloba in the treatment of subacute tinnitus: a retrospective study of 94 patients.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ and Ginkgo biloba in the treatment of subacute @<m>DISEASE_Tinnitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014012 @@@tinnitus@@@: a retrospective study of 94 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Canis M, Olzowy B, Welz C, Suckfüll M, Stelter K. Simvastatin and Ginkgo biloba in the treatment of subacute tinnitus: a retrospective study of 94 patients. Am J Otolaryngol. 2011 Jan-Feb;32(1):19-23. PMID: 20015810
citations.BibTeX: @article{20015810, title={Simvastatin and Ginkgo biloba in the treatment of subacute tinnitus: a retrospective study of 94 patients.}, author={Canis M and Olzowy B and Welz C and Suckfüll M and Stelter K}, journal={Am J Otolaryngol}, volume={32}, number={1}, pages={19-23}}
